pullrequest.title: Model becomes transparent while being manpulated

content.raw: Yes, you're correct, there's no unit test for the class yet. That's something we're trying to fix as we add new functionality to Gazebo. Let me know if you need help creating a test. I would start by copying the `ModelAlign_TEST`, for example. The `SetHighlighted` test is probably similar to what we need here.
content.html: Yes, you're correct, there's no unit test for the class yet. That's something we're trying to fix as we add new functionality to Gazebo. Let me know if you need help creating a test. I would start by copying the ModelAlign_TEST, for example. The SetHighlighted test is probably similar to what we need here.
